heading: Requirement of license
text:
It shall be unlawful for any person to engage in or carry on in the city any business, trade or
occupation regulated by this chapter or to hold himself or herself out as authorized to engage in or carry on such activity, without
having first obtained a license from the commissioner in accordance with and subject to the provisions of this chapter and th e rules of
the department. A license issued by the department for any such business, trade or occupation prior to July 1, 2008 shall remain in
full force and effect until the expiration or termination thereof in accordance with the terms thereof, unless sooner revoked or
suspended for cause as hereinafter provided. Any renewal of such license shall be in accordance with the provisions of this code.
